org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class AmbariServerConfigurationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.AmbariServerConfigurationHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbariServerLDAPConfigurationHandler, AmbariServerSSOConfigurationHandler

    public class AmbariServerConfigurationHandler
extends Object
    AmbariServerConfigurationHandler handles Ambari server specific configuration properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentConfigurations

        public Map<String,RootServiceComponentConfiguration> getComponentConfigurations(String categoryName)
        Retrieve the requested component configurations.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the category name (or null for all)
        Returns:
        a map of category names to properties (name/value pairs).

      • removeComponentConfiguration

        public void removeComponentConfiguration(String categoryName)
        Delete the requested configuration.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the category name

      • updateComponentCategory

        public void updateComponentCategory(String categoryName,
                                    Map<String,String> properties,
                                    boolean removePropertiesIfNotSpecified)
                             throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Set or update a configuration category with the specified properties.

        If removePropertiesIfNotSpecified is true, the persisted category is to include only the specified properties.

        If removePropertiesIfNotSpecified is false, the persisted category is to include the union of the existing and specified properties.

        In any case, existing property values will be overwritten by the one specified in the property map.

        Parameters:
        categoryName - the category name
        properties - a map of properties to set
        removePropertiesIfNotSpecified - true to ensure the set of properties are only those that have be explicitly specified; false to update the set of existing properties with the specified set of properties, adding missing properties but not removing any properties
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - in case an error occurred while updating category's properties

      • performOperation

        public org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.RootServiceComponentConfigurationHandler.OperationResult performOperation(String categoryName,
                                                                                                                              Map<String,String> properties,
                                                                                                                              boolean mergeExistingProperties,
                                                                                                                              String operation,
                                                                                                                              Map<String,Object> operationParameters)
                                                                                                                       throws SystemException
        Preform some operation on the set of data for a category.

        If mergeExistingProperties is false, the operation is to include the union of the existing and specified properties.

        If mergeExistingProperties is false, the operation is to include only the specified properties.

        Parameters:
        categoryName - the category name
        properties - a map of properties to set
        mergeExistingProperties - true to use the the set of existing properties along with the specified set of properties; false to use set of specified properties only
        operation - the operation to perform
        operationParameters - parameters to supply the name operation
        Returns:
        an OperationResult
        Throws:
        SystemException - if an error occurs while handling the request

      • getConfigurations

        public Map<String,Map<String,String>> getConfigurations()

      • getConfigurationProperties

        public Map<String,String> getConfigurationProperties(String categoryName)
        Get the properties associated with a configuration category
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the requested category
        Returns:
        a map of property names to values; or null if the data does not exist

                                         String enabledServicesPropertyName)
